cards.name: The Guy in the 4000$ Suit
cards.description: Gain +4 Recognition per turn, Gain +10 Confidence, Lose -15 Social Skills.
cards.flavourText: Why don’t I just take a whiz through this 5000 dollar suit? COME ON!

cards.name: Stress Seminar
cards.description: Stress, if higher -10 Recognition, if lower +10 Recognition. +10 Stress.
cards.flavourText: Anyone still experiencing stress by the end of the day will be FIRED!

cards.name: Phone A Friend
cards.description: If Intelligence > 120, gain +10 Recognition, +5 Stress, +10 Confidence . +10 Social Skills If Intelligence < 120 lose -10 Recognition, -10 Confidence, -10 Social Skills, Gain +15 Stress.
cards.flavourText: Anyone still experiencing stress by the end of the day will be FIRED!

cards.name: Trapped by a Spider
cards.description: Lose -5 Recognition per turn, -5 Confidence, Gain +20 Stress.
cards.flavourText: The Spider has managed to walk behind me, and it’s between me and the door. So I can’t get out

cards.name: Loud Typing
cards.description: Lose -2 Recognition per turn, Lose -5 Social Skills, Gain 10+ Stress, +5 Work Ethic.
cards.flavourText: Can you stop!

cards.name: Neuralyzer
cards.description: Send Either all of the cards on your side of the field to the graveyard, or send all of the cards on your opponent’s side of the field to the graveyard.
cards.flavourText: Wait a minute. You just flash that thing, it erases her memory, and you just make up a new one?

cards.name: Called in to Work
cards.description: Gain +5 Recognition per turn, Gain +15 Work Ethic, +10 Stress, lose -5 Social Skill.
cards.flavourText: I’m not even supposed to be here today…

cards.name: Smoke Break
cards.description: Removes -50 Stress
cards.flavourText: Jaysus I need a rollie

cards.name: The Red Door
cards.description: Lose -4 Recognition per turn,  Lose -5 Work Ethic, Gain +10 Creativity.
cards.flavourText: What could possibly be behind that damn door, I haven’t slept, I’m up all night thinking about it…

cards.name: Turned Goth
cards.description: Play a card from the graveyard.
cards.flavourText: I just found this fresh new band, it’s called Bauhaus.

cards.name: New Boss
cards.description: Removes all Standard cards from the board, they are sent directly to the Graveyard.
cards.flavourText: 26? And you’re my new boss?

cards.name: Dating the Manager’s Daughter
cards.description: If Confidence > 140, lose -40 Stress. Gain +10 Social Skills. If Confidence < 120 lose -10 Recognition, -15 Confidence, -15 Social Skills, Gain +30 Stress.
cards.flavourText: I can explain… oh wait no I can’t.

cards.name: Business VS Card
cards.description: If Confidence + Social Skills player > opponent, lose -40 Stress. Gain +10 Social Skills. If Confidence + Social Skills < less than opponent lose -10 Recognition, -20 Confidence, -20 Social Skills, Gain +30 Stress.
cards.flavourText: Look at that subtle off-white coloring. The tasteful thickness of it. Oh, my God. It even has a watermark.

cards.name: Act Annoyed
cards.description: +3 Recognition for two turns, +20 Stress +20 Confidence,-10 Social Skills
cards.flavourText: Yeah, when you look annoyed all the time, people think that you're busy.

cards.name: Duvet Day
cards.description: -5 Recognition -40 Stress +20 Confidence, +10 Creativty, +10 Social Skills
cards.flavourText: BEEP.BEEP.BEEP.BEEP

cards.name: Forget-Me-Know
cards.description: Last card played effects reversed: -20 Stress, -10 Social Skills, 10 Confidence
cards.flavourText: Sssshhhh. Shhhhh. There now, its ok go to sleep

cards.name: Voodoo DOLL
cards.description: -3 Recognition, -5 All Base Skills, + 5 Stress
cards.flavourText: I can feel something hanging over me, like some dark force that makes me want to not recycle

cards.name: Accidental Nazi
cards.description: -5 Recognition, -10 Social Skills, +10 Confidence, +10 Work Ethic +10 Stress
cards.flavourText: I hear you’re a racist now

cards.name: Pan Pipe Dreams
cards.description: -50 Stress, -15 Work Ethic, -10 Social Skills
cards.flavourText: The soothing sounds of the Andes-but in the office

cards.name: Elephant in the room
cards.description: -3 Recognition for 2 turns,  +10 Stress
cards.flavourText: You didn’t get the memo on bring your pet to work

cards.name: Waste Disposal
cards.description: -3 Recognition, -10 Social Skills, -10 Confidence
cards.flavourText: Disregard of the companies green policies is a sackable offence

cards.name: Defamation email got caught.
cards.description: Lose -20 Recognition, Gain +20 Stress, Lose -20 Social Skills
cards.flavourText: Why did I send that e-mail!

cards.name: Didn’t save your work
cards.description: Gain -5 Recognition, Gain -10 Confidence, Gain +20 Stress
cards.flavourText: Bollocks, I did that again! My whole day is lost!!!!

cards.name: Watching Inappropriate Content.
cards.description: Lose -25 Recognition, Lose -10 Social Skills, Gain +20 Stress.
cards.flavourText: Oh man, I knew it would happen someday!

cards.name: Hey boss, lunch is on me today!
cards.description: Gain +15 Recognition, Gain +10 Social Skills, Lose -10 Stress.
cards.flavourText: Better avail that the boss is in a good mood today

cards.name: All emails are answered!
cards.description: Gain +15 Recognition, Gain  +10 Social Skills, Gain +10 Stress.
cards.flavourText: Well done! You answered all your emails and are on top of your job!

cards.name: Sick Leave
cards.description: -30 Stress
cards.flavourText: I don’t know if I laugh or cry, but it’s good to be away from the job for a while…!

cards.name: Office Gossip
cards.description: Lose -10 Recognition, Lose -10 Social Skills, Lose -10 Work Ethic
cards.flavourText: I was so happy to find out Stanley was having an affair got to tell everyone!

cards.name: Brought in your famous chili
cards.description: Gain +10 Recognition, Gain +10 Social Skills, Lose -5 Stress.
cards.flavourText: The trick is to undercook the onions.

cards.name: Manage yourself
cards.description: Gain +10 Recognition, Lose -5 Social Skills, Lose -5 Confidence.
cards.flavourText: I've been managing my department for several years now and I am not easy to manage

cards.name: Office Plant Whisperer
cards.description: Gain +5 Recognition, Gain +5 Work Ethic, Lose -5 Stress
cards.flavourText: Who knew all plants needed to survive was water and sunlight

cards.name: Overtime
cards.description: Gain +20 Recognition, Gain +5 Work Ethic, Gain +15 Stress
cards.flavourText: Who needs sleep anyway?

cards.name: Parking Space Bandit
cards.description: Lose -10 Recognition, Lose -10 Work Ethic, Lose -20 Social Skills
cards.flavourText: First come, first served, right?

cards.name: Water Cooler Epiphanies
cards.description: Gain +10 Recognition, Lose -5 Stress, Gain +5 Social Skills
cards.flavourText: I just had the best idea by the water cooler.

cards.name: Elevator Pitch
cards.description: Gain +20 Recognition, Gain +10 Work Ethic, Gain +20 Social Skills, Gain +5 Stress
cards.flavourText: Going up? Let me tell you about my project.

cards.name: PowerPoint Perfection
cards.description: Gain +20 Recognition, Gain +5 Work Ethic, Gain +10 Confidence
cards.flavourText: My PowerPoint game is strong today.

cards.name: Cubicle Feng Shui
cards.description: Gain +5 Recognition, Gain +5 Work Ethic, Lose -5 Stress
cards.flavourText: Who said cubicles can't be Zen?

cards.name: Print Master
cards.description: Gain +5 Recognition, Gain +5 Work Ethic, Gain +5 Confidence
cards.flavourText: No paper jam stands a chance against me.

cards.name: Office Supply Thief
cards.description: Lose -20 Recognition, Lose -5 Work Ethic, Lose -10 Social Skills
cards.flavourText: Hey, have you seen my stapler?

cards.name: Microwave Mishap
cards.description: Lose -5 Recognition, Gain +10 Stress, Lose -5 Social Skills, Lose -5 Confidence
cards.flavourText: So, maybe I shouldn't have microwaved that.

cards.name: Awkward Handshake
cards.description: Lose -10 Recognition, Lose -10 Confidence, Lose -15 Social Skills
cards.flavourText: Do I go for the fist bump or the handshake?

cards.name: Mass Email Mishap
cards.description: Lose -20 Recognition, Lose -10 Social Skills, Gain +10 Stress, Lose -5 Work Ethic
cards.flavourText: The entire office didn't need to know that.

cards.name: New Look
cards.description: Gain +20 Recognition, Gain +10 Stress.
cards.flavourText: Such style, Such grace, who knew.

cards.name: Office Quiz Showdown
cards.description: Whomever has the higher intelligence level. Winner gains +20 Recognition.
cards.flavourText: Put your knowledge to the test.

cards.name: Head Office Visit
cards.description: Based on Confidence. If Confidence is above 120, gain +10 Recognition for 2 turns. If below, lose -10 Recognition.
cards.flavourText: Look busy, it's head office.

cards.name: Sticky Note Battle
cards.description: Passive-aggressively battle your opponent with sticky notes. Based on Work Ethic. If a player has a higher Work Ethic, they gain +10 Recognition; if lower, they lose -10 Recognition.
cards.flavourText: What is this.

cards.name: Bloatware Sabotage
cards.description: Sabotage your opponent's workflow by installing bloatware on their PC. Requires 120 Intelligence and Confidence. If higher, reduce the opponent's Recognition by 10; if lower, reduce your own Recognition by 5 for 3 turns.
cards.flavourText: Why is this so slow?

cards.name: Michael Jackson Dance-Off
cards.description: Michael Jackson dance-off at the office party. Player with Higher Confidence +15 Recognition. +10 stress, +10 social skills for both players, -10 work ethic
cards.flavourText: Shamone.

cards.name: Meeting Miscommunication
cards.description: In a meeting, fail to pass on relevant information to the other player. If their Confidence is above 140, they gain 20 Recognition. If lower, they lose 15 Recognition.
cards.flavourText: Communication is key.

cards.name: Valentine's Day
cards.description: You write your boss a Valentine's card from the opponent. If your Intelligence and Social Skills are both above 120, your opponent gets +10 Recognition and +10 Stress, while you gain a boost of +10 to all stats and -20 Stress. If unsuccessful, you get -5 for all stats and -15 Recognition.
cards.flavourText: I choo, choo, choose you!

cards.name: Small Talk Football
cards.description: In this challenge, you and your opponent engage in small talk about football. The player with the higher social skills gains +10 to each stat and -10 stress.
cards.flavourText: That’s the thing about Arsenal, they always try to walk it in the net.

cards.name: Office Showdown
cards.description: Battle for the bonus : Compare work ethic, social skills, and confidence. Winner gains +15 Recognition and +10 Work Ethic. If you lose, lose -10 Recognition and -5 Work Ethic.
cards.flavourText: There can be only one.

cards.name: The Fugayzi
cards.description: If your Social Skills and Confidence are greater than 130, gain -30 Stress. If not, lose -10 Recognition.
cards.flavourText: It's all a fugayzi, you know what a fugayzi is?

cards.name: That's not punch
cards.description: If stress is over 120 - you drink the punch and lose 10 Recognition. If under, you skip the punch and gain +10 Work Ethic, +10 Social Skills, and +10 Confidence.
cards.flavourText: Somebody didn't read the sign on the bowl.

cards.name: Loud Humming Coworker
cards.description: If your stress is higher than your opponent's stress, you lose 10 recognition but your stress is reduced by 20. If your stress is lower, you gain 10 recognition.
cards.flavourText: I'm gonna kill you.

cards.name: Avoid Ian
cards.description: If confidence is less than 120, Ian reduces -20 work ethic and +20 stress. If confidence is higher, escape and gain +5 in all stats and reduce stress by 10.
cards.flavourText: Ian seems nice, until you talk to him for more than 5 minutes.

cards.name: Affirmations
cards.description: If work ethic is higher than 120, reduce stress by 20 and boost all other stats by 5. If lower, increase stress by 10 for 3 turns and lose 5 recognition.
cards.flavourText: Repeating positive affirmations can have a powerful effect on your mindset.

cards.name: Friday Bake Off
cards.description: Player with higher Intelligence and Confidence gets +5 Recognition for 3 turns, loser - 5 and + 10 Stress
cards.flavourText: Whose dish will come out on top?

cards.name: Faux Pas
cards.description: If Social Skills and Confidence > Stress Levels and >120, +5 Recognition, +5 Confidence, +5 Social Skills. If under, -5 Recognition, -5 Confidence, -5 Social Skills
cards.flavourText: That was not the appropriate thing to say in that situation.

cards.name: Omlette du fromage
cards.description: Everyone thinks you can speak French. If confidence is over 130, boost recognition by 5, social skills by 10, and stress by 10. If under, lose 5 recognition and 10 intelligence.
cards.flavourText: Je ne suis pas travailleur acharné.

cards.name: Dark Humour
cards.description: If social skills are above 130, +5 recognition, -10 stress
cards.flavourText: Sometimes, laughter is the best medicine...even if it's a little twisted.

cards.name: Pictures of Your Dog
cards.description: If Social Skills are less than 140, lose -5 all stats, +10 stress, -5 recognition. If higher, gain +10 recognition.
cards.flavourText: Wow, what a cute dog!

cards.name: Extra Hours
cards.description: If your work ethic is higher than your opponent's, gain +10 Work Ethic, +20 Stress, +10 Recognition, but lose -5 in all other skills. If lower, lose -10 Work Ethic, +5 Recognition, but gain -20 Stress and +5 in all other skills.
cards.flavourText: Another day, another dollar.

cards.name: Too Political
cards.description: If intelligence is less than 130, you lose -5 recognition, -5 intelligence, -5 social skills. If higher, +5 recognition, +5 intelligence, +5 social skills.
cards.flavourText: Let's stick to talking about the weather.

cards.name: Happy Birthday
cards.description: +5 boost to confidence, social skills, recognition
cards.flavourText: Another year wiser!

cards.name: Conspiracy Theorist
cards.description: -5 Recognition, -5 Intelligence, +5 Confidence, -5 Stress
cards.flavourText: Chemtrails bro.

cards.name: Yoga Session
cards.description: -20 stress, +5 boost to social skills, confidence, intelligence, work ethic
cards.flavourText: Find your inner peace and productivity.

cards.name: Fake COVID
cards.description: Call in sick, -10 Work Ethic, -5 Recognition, -20 Stress, +5 Other Skills
cards.flavourText: Sometimes a mental health day is just what you need.

cards.name: Smelling Good
cards.description: All stats are boosted by 5 (excluding stress)
cards.flavourText: When you look good and smell good, you feel good.

cards.name: IT Specialist
cards.description: Turn it off and turn it back on. If intelligence is over 120, boost all stats by 5 and increase stress by 10.
cards.flavourText: Have you tried turning it off and on again?
